product_name: Marmot Southshore Flannel Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're hiking by a lake or just relaxing at the water's edge, the women's Marmot Southshore Flannel shirt will keep you comfortable with its soft performance fabric and UPF 30 sun protection. Midweight, technical performance woven fabric and hollowcore flannel wicks moisture, dries quickly and offers light warmth without too much weight. The long-sleeved shirt has double chest pockets plus shaping darts at the bust and back for a feminine fit. Marmot Thalia Flannel shirt for women features flat seams, a shirt tail hem and double chest pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're hiking by a lake or just relaxing at the water's edge, the women's Marmot Southshore Flannel shirt will keep you comfortable with its soft performance fabric and UPF 30 sun protection.
